title: Slow Cooker Buffalo Chicken Sandwiches Recipe
description: This crockpot Buffalo chicken recipe is super easy to prepare. Perfect for spicy sandwiches that will please anyone who loves Buffalo chicken wings!
body: ​ Skip to content Allrecipes Search Please fill out this field. Search the site Please fill out this field. About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Never lose a recipe: Join MyRecipes to save and find favorites from AR & beyond Recipes Main Dishes Sandwich Recipes Chicken Slow Cooker Buffalo Chicken Sandwiches 4.4 (2,549) 1,782 Reviews 128 Photos This crockpot Buffalo chicken is great for hearty sandwiches that will please those who love Buffalo chicken wings. This recipe is perfect for those days spent watching football. I like to top these with blue cheese or ranch dressing. Submitted by Divinesolace21 Updated on March 27, 2024 Save Rate Print Share Add Photo 128 128 128 128 Prep Time: 10 mins Cook Time: 6 hrs Total Time: 6 hrs 10 mins Servings: 6 Yield: 6 sandwiches Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 6 servings 4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves 1 (17.5 fluid ounce) bottle Buffalo wing sauce, divided ½ (1 ounce) package dry ranch salad dressing mix 2 tablespoons butter 6 hoagie rolls, split lengthwise Directions Gather all ingredients. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Place chicken breasts into the slow cooker; pour in 3/4 of the wing sauce and ranch dressing mix. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Cover and cook on Low for 6 to 7 hours. Shred chicken in the cooker with two forks. Stir in butter. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Pile shredded chicken and sauce onto hoagie rolls. Serve with remaining Buffalo sauce. Dotdash Meredith Food Studios Serve and enjoy! Dotdash Meredith Food Studios I Made It Print 3,042 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 578 Calories 14g Fat 81g Carbs 31g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 6 Calories 578 % Daily Value * Total Fat 14g 18% Saturated Fat 4g 22% Cholesterol 54mg 18% Sodium 2902mg 126% Total Carbohydrate 81g 29% Dietary Fiber 4g 13% Total Sugars 5g Protein 31g 63% Vitamin C 1mg 1% Calcium 197mg 15% Iron 5mg 27% Potassium 396mg 8% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Slow Cooker Buffalo Chicken Sandwiches 01 of 128 Photo by  Dotdash Meredith Food Studios 02 of 128 Photo by  Selena Lang 11/21/2024 Easy to follow A keeper! My Kids loved this definitely a keeper to put on my dinner rotation 03 of 128 Photo by  Paula 09/13/2023 This had a great flavor, but the best part is so few ingredients and a ready-to-serve meal with very little effort. 04 of 128 Photo by  THEBACCHUS 07/27/2020 I didn’t have bottled Buffalo Wing Sauce so made to Buffalo Chicken Wing Sauce from this site without adding additional cayenne or vinegar. Served w iceberg lettuce as a wrap, thinly sliced celery and green onion, and with Ken’s chunky blue cheese dressing. Yummy!Next time I used homemade Buffalo Chicken Wing Sauce from this site using Louisiana Hot Sauce (much more mild than others) - do NOT add cayenne 05 of 128 Photo by  mgriffey 05/12/2020 06 of 128 Photo by  Laura 04/03/2020 07 of 128 Photo by  Robyn Adelman 01/01/2020 I made it using Buffalo and also a mild sauce version. There is regular chicken salad in the background of the picture from a different recipe. This was SUPER spicy and ABSOLUTELY amazing. The smell and the taste. TWO THUMBS UP!!! 08 of 128 Photo by  Robyn Adelman 01/01/2020 I made it using Buffalo and also a mild sauce version. There is regular chicken salad in the background of the picture from a different recipe. This was SUPER spicy and ABSOLUTELY amazing. The smell and the taste. TWO THUMBS UP!!! 09 of 128 Photo by  Pat J 10/02/2019 10 of 128 Photo by  Amy LaPierre 06/25/2019 This was fabulous!! I used the leftover chicken the next day for chicken nachos and they were the best!! Definitely saving this recipe to add to our meal rotation. 1 2 3 4 5 Next You’ll Also Love Easy Buffalo Chicken Sliders 54 Ratings Buffalo Chicken Wraps 259 Ratings Buffalo Chicken Sloppy Joes 55 Ratings Touchdown Pizza 42 Ratings Buffalo Chicken Calzone 130 Ratings Buffalo Chicken Wing Sliders 3 Ratings Buffalo-Style Chicken Pizza 1,384 Ratings Hot Buffalo Chicken, Bacon, and Cheese Sandwich 135 Ratings Buffalo Chicken and Ranch Wraps 103 Ratings Panko Buffalo Chicken Tenders 6 Ratings Buffalo Chicken Grilled Cheese Sandwiches 2 Ratings Spicy Baked Tofu and Spinach Wrap 4 Ratings Crispy Buffalo Chicken Sandwiches Buffalo Chicken Pasta Salad 179 Ratings Bangin' Buffalo Blue Cheese Chicken Salad 7 Ratings Keto Buffalo Chicken Omelette 1 Rating Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family.
